content.text:
# List of Cultural Properties of Japan – historical materials (Kanagawa)

This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of  for the Prefecture of Kanagawa.
National Cultural Properties
As of 1 August 2015, six Important Cultural Properties have been designated, being of national significance.
{| class="wikitable sortable"  style="width:100%;"

|-

|-
| align="center"|Plan of Tsurugaoka HachimangūTsuruoka hachimangū sashizu (Tenshō jūkunen gogatsu jūyōka) ||  || Kamakura || Tsurugaoka Hachimangū || ||  ||  || [https://kunishitei.bunka.go.jp/heritage/detail/201/10187 ]
|-
| align="center"|Map of JapanNihon zu (Tōtōmi, Echigo itō ketsu) ||  || Yokohama || (kept at Kanazawa Bunko) || half of the map, east of Tōtōmi and Echigo Provinces, is missing || ||  || [https://kunishitei.bunka.go.jp/heritage/detail/201/10178 ]
|-
|}
Prefectural Cultural Properties
As of September 2014, one property has been designated at a prefectural level.
